ing: 1 ounce sour apple schnapps (such as DeKuyperÂ® Sour Apple Pucker)
1 fluid ounce butterscotch schnapps (such as DeKuyperÂ® ButtershotsÂ®)
des: "Nobody can drink just one! A refreshing cocktail for summer parties or anytime!"
ins:
Pour sugar onto a small, shallow plate. Moisten the rim of a martini glass with water and dip the moistened glass into sugar.
Fill a shaker with ice. Pour in vanilla vodka, sour apple schnapps, and butterscotch schnapps. Cover the shaker and shake until chilled; strain cocktail into prepared martini glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
